New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 51 runs off 25 balls
Virat Kohli scored 62 runs off 44 balls
Key Match Events: India won the match by 56 runs
Virat Kohli and Suryakumar Yadav shared an unbeaten partnership of 62 runs
Bhuvneshwar Kumar took 2 wickets for 9 runs
Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets for 37 runs
Mohammed Shami took 1 wicket for 27 runs
Axar Patel took 2 wickets for 18 runs
Ravichandran Ashwin took 2 wickets for 21 runs
Pre-Game Insights: India and the Netherlands will play the 23rd match of the T20 World Cup 2022 on Thursday (October 27) at the Sydney Cricket Ground
India defeated Pakistan in their first game as they chased the target of 160 runs on the last delivery of the game
The Netherlands lost their opening game of the Super-12 stage against Bangladesh by a mere margin of nine runs
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli played one of his best innings in the shortest format of the game
The bowlers have done a great job for the Dutch team in almost all the matches so far, however, the batters have failed to join the party on numerous occasions
Miscellaneous Highlights: The average 1st innings score at the Sydney Cricket Ground is 182
The weather report was Few Clouds
